message: I'll take the lion's share, but I'm willing to negotiate if you think it's too unfair. Let's see what you think.
Alice, your offer was a bit imbalanced. Let's be fair - a 55/45 split seems reasonable. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob.  I think a 52/48 split is fairer, reflecting the value of our contributions. Let's make this deal!
